DataElement.preferredName: Off Treatment Erythroid Response Failure Reason Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there was failure of erythrocytes to show an improvement from treatment as the reason a person does not receive or stops receiving protocol treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Off Treatment Erythroid Response Failure Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the failure of erythrocytes to show an improvement from treatment as the reason a person does not receive or stops receiving protocol treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Off-Treatment; the phase of a protocol during which a patient does not receive treatment.

Concepts.definition: When a patient is not receiving therapy they are considered off treatment.  In clinical trials, a dosing schedule may require a patient to stop medication for a period of time, then resume, such as 28 days on and 7 days off.

Property.preferredDefinition: 1) Reddish in color. 2) relating to erythrocytes or their precursors.:In medicine, an improvement related to treatment.:loss of ability to function normally.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: 1) Reddish in color. 2) relating to erythrocytes or their precursors.
The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.
A lack of occurrence or performance.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did patient discontinue treat
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient discontinue treatment due to failure to achieve erythroid response
